key_risks: Regulatory and compliance issues, including FDA warning letter and evolving healthcare regulations
Financial performance concerns, including GAAP net loss and leadership transitions
Supply chain vulnerabilities, including disruptions and dependence on third-party manufacturers

ESG risks, including ambitious emissions reduction targets and labor disputes
controversies: FDA warning letter over quality control and compliance failures
Unfair labor practice cases filed by the SEIU
environmental_issues: Pressure to meet emissions reduction targets (50% by 2030, Net Zero by 2050)
social_issues: Labor disputes and potential disruptions to employee relations
governance_issues: Leadership transitions and potential issues with financial controls
